languages.text: "Так гласит закон Футфола — Вольный Торговец, прилетающий на него, имеет право царствовать над ним. Не душегубу же Владайму заправлять на станции. Скоро он будет болтаться на виселице, как и его дружки из Касбаллики, как и смутьяны анверы, столь возмутительным образом тревожившие Футфол".

"Such is the law of Footfall. Any Rogue Trader who arrives here assumes the right of absolute authority. Surely it is not that thug Tocara who deserves to rule this station. He will soon be hanging from a noose, and so will his Kasballican henchmen, and so will those Anver firebrands whose outrageous activities brought Footfall so much grief."
languages.original_text: "Так гласит закон Футфола — Вольный Торговец, прилетающий на него, имеет право царствовать над ним. Не душегубу же Владайму заправлять на станции. Скоро он будет болтаться на виселице, как и его дружки из Касбаллики, как и смутьяны анверы, столь возмутительным образом тревожившие Футфол".

He will soon be hanging from a noose, and so will his Kasballican henchmen, and so will those Anver firebrands whose outrageous activities brought Footfall so much grief."

languages.text: “这就是落脚港的法律，任何来到这里的行商浪人，都拥有至高无上的权力。统治这座星站的人，绝对不该是托卡拉那个无赖。我很快就会把他绞死，把他那些卡斯巴利卡党羽也一起绞死，还有那些自称‘安维尔帮’的乱党。他们的暴行已经为落脚港带来了太多痛苦。”
languages.original_text: "Such is the law of Footfall. Any Rogue Trader who arrives here assumes the right of absolute authority. Surely it is not that thug Tocara who deserves to rule this station. He will soon be hanging from a noose, and so will his Kasballican henchmen, and so will those Anver firebrands whose outrageous activities brought Footfall so much grief."

traits.locale_text: “这就是落脚港的法律，任何来到这里的行商浪人，都拥有至高无上的权力。统治这座星站的人，绝对不该是托卡拉那个无赖。我很快就会把他绞死，他那些卡斯巴利卡党羽也会被一起绞死，还有那些自称‘安维尔帮’的乱党。他们的暴行已经为落脚港带来了太多痛苦。”

languages.text: 「それがフットフォールの法律だ。ここに来る自由開拓者は皆、絶対的な権力があると思っている。このステーションを支配するにふさわしいのは、あのゴロツキのトカラではないはずだ。奴は近いうちに首吊りになるだろうし、カスバリカ子分達や、無道な行いによりフットフォールに大いなる悲しみをもたらしたアンヴァー扇動者も、同じ運命を辿るだろう」
languages.original_text: "Such is the law of Footfall. Any Rogue Trader who arrives here assumes the right of absolute authority. Surely it is not that thug Tocara who deserves to rule this station. He will soon be hanging from a noose, and so will his Kasballican henchmen, and so will those Anver firebrands whose outrageous activities brought Footfall so much grief."

traits.locale_text: 「それがフットフォールの法律だ。ここに来る自由開拓者は皆、絶対的な権力があると思っている。このステーションを支配するにふさわしいのは、あの殺人犯トカラではないはずだ。奴は近いうちに首吊りになるだろうし、カスバリカ子分達や、無道な行いによりフットフォールに大いなる悲しみをもたらしたアンヴァー扇動者も、同じ運命を辿るだろう」

languages.text: «Esa es la ley de Paso. Cualquier Comerciante Independiente que llegue asume el derecho de autoridad absoluta. Sin duda alguna, el matón de Tocara no es quien merece gobernar esta estación. Pronto estará colgando de una soga, y también lo estarán sus secuaces de la Kasballica, al igual que esos alborotadores Anvers, cuyas actividades causaron tanto dolor a Paso».
languages.original_text: "Such is the law of Footfall. Any Rogue Trader who arrives here assumes the right of absolute authority. Surely it is not that thug Tocara who deserves to rule this station. He will soon be hanging from a noose, and so will his Kasballican henchmen, and so will those Anver firebrands whose outrageous activities brought Footfall so much grief."

traits.locale_text: «Esa es la ley de Paso. Cualquier Comerciante Independiente que llegue asume el derecho de autoridad absoluta. Sin duda alguna, el despiadado de Tocara no es quien merece gobernar esta estación. Pronto estará colgando de una soga, y también lo estarán sus secuaces de la Kasballica, al igual que esos alborotadores Anvers, cuyas actividades causaron tanto dolor a Paso».

languages.text: "Das ist das Gesetz auf Footfall. Jeder Freihändler, der hier eintrifft, übernimmt das Recht der absoluten Autorität. Gewiss hat es nicht dieser Schläger Tocara verdient, über die Station zu herrschen. Er wird schon bald an einer Schlinge baumeln, genau wie seine Schergen von der Kasballica und die Anver-Aufwiegler, deren unerhörte Aktivitäten Footfall so viele Probleme bereitet haben."
languages.original_text: "Such is the law of Footfall. Any Rogue Trader who arrives here assumes the right of absolute authority. Surely it is not that thug Tocara who deserves to rule this station. He will soon be hanging from a noose, and so will his Kasballican henchmen, and so will those Anver firebrands whose outrageous activities brought Footfall so much grief."

traits.locale_text: "Das ist das Gesetz auf Footfall. Jeder Freihändler, der hier eintrifft, übernimmt das Recht der absoluten Autorität. Gewiss hat es nicht dieser Halsabschneider Tocara verdient, über die Station zu herrschen. Er wird schon bald an einer Schlinge baumeln, genau wie seine Schergen von der Kasballica und die Anver-Aufwiegler, deren unerhörte Aktivitäten Footfall so viele Probleme bereitet haben."

languages.text: « Telle est la loi, à Castel : tout libre-marchand qui vient ici jouit d'une autorité absolue. Vous n'allez pas me dire que cette canaille de Tocara mérite de diriger cette station, tout de même ? Il se balancera bientôt au bout d'une corde, comme ses comparses de la Kasballica et ces boutefeux d'Anver dont les agissements ont causé tant de tort à Castel. »
languages.original_text: "Such is the law of Footfall. Any Rogue Trader who arrives here assumes the right of absolute authority. Surely it is not that thug Tocara who deserves to rule this station. He will soon be hanging from a noose, and so will his Kasballican henchmen, and so will those Anver firebrands whose outrageous activities brought Footfall so much grief."

traits.locale_text: « Telle est la loi, à Castel : tout libre-marchand qui vient ici jouit d'une autorité absolue. Vous n'allez pas me dire que cette canaille de Tocara mérite de diriger cette station, tout de même ? Il se balancera bientôt au bout d'une corde, comme ses comparses de la Kasballica et ces boutefeux d'Anver dont les agissements ont causé tant de tort à Castel. »

languages.text: "Binliman kanunları bu şekildedir. Buraya gelen bir Hür Tacir, kesin yetki sahibi hâline gelir. Bu istasyonu yönetmeyi hak eden kişi Tocara denen o serseri değildi elbette. O da, onun Kasballica uşakları da, taşkın eylemleriyle Binliman'ın başına sayısız dert açan şu Anver eşkiyaları da çok yakında darağacında sallanacak."
languages.original_text: "Such is the law of Footfall. Any Rogue Trader who arrives here assumes the right of absolute authority. Surely it is not that thug Tocara who deserves to rule this station. He will soon be hanging from a noose, and so will his Kasballican henchmen, and so will those Anver firebrands whose outrageous activities brought Footfall so much grief."

traits.locale_text: "Binliman kanunları bu şekildedir. Buraya gelen bir Hür Tacir, kesin yetki sahibi hâline gelir. Bu istasyonu yönetmeyi hak eden kişi Tocara denen o serseri değildi elbette.
